to push the Columbus Republican toward the White House. A group of South Carolina lawmakers stood on the steps of their state Capitol on Wednesday to encourage Mike Pence to run. It's not a complicated message, but it's a heartfelt one, state Dick Armey Kris Crawford said. "We would like him on the ballot." Leaders of the conservative movement made the same argument in a letter to Mike Pence this week.
